Container.Name: lancache-prefill-ui
Container.Overview:
Web UI for managing lancache prefill operations across Steam, Battle.net, and Epic Games. Pre-download game content through your lancache server so LAN clients get instant speeds.
Features: - Native Steam integration (no CLI tool needed) with multi-account support - Battle.net and Epic Games support via CLI prefill tools - Real-time download progress via SSE - Game library browser with Steam header images - Remote cache stats via SSH - Job history and logging
Container.Description: Web UI for managing lancache prefill operations. Pre-download Steam, Battle.net, and Epic Games content through your lancache so LAN clients get maximum download speeds.

Config.Name: Database
Config.Description: Persistent storage for the SQLite database and app data

Config.Name: Lancache Cache Directory
Config.Description: Path to your lancache cache directory (read-only). Used for cache size stats. Leave empty if using remote SSH mode.

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: SQLite database path (usually no need to change)

Config.Name: LANCACHE_PATH
Config.Description: Cache path inside the container (must match the mount above)
